contentrichtext.text: '''[[Miser|Scrooge]]''' is a term for a miserly person - it may also refer to: ==The character from the novel== *[[Ebenezer Scrooge]], the protagonist of Charles Dickens' novel ''[[A Christmas Carol]]'' *''[[Scrooge, or, Marley's Ghost]]'', a 1901 silent film *[[Scrooge (1913 film)|''Scrooge'' (1913 film)]] *[[Scrooge (1935 film)|''Scrooge'' (1935 film)]] *[[Scrooge (1951 film)|''Scrooge'' (1951 film)]] *[[Scrooge (1970 film)|''Scrooge'' (1970 film)]], a musical film *''[[Scrooge (musical)]]'', a 1992 stage musical ==Others== *''[[Scrooged]]'', a 1988 film *[[Scrooge McDuck]], a Disney cartoon and comics character who also bears a miserly personality **''[[Scrooge McDuck and Money]]'' **[[Scrooge McDuck universe]] *''[[Scrooge McRock]]'', Grand Buffet album, 1997 *[[RT-20 (missile)]] (NATO reporting name: SS-15 Scrooge), an intercontinental ballistic missile developed by the Soviet Union {{disambig}}
